template<class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
struct stGHTree< ObjectType, EvaluatorType >::GHTreeHeader

This type defines the header of the GHTree.

template<class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
char stGHTree< ObjectType, EvaluatorType >::GHTreeHeader::Magic[4]
 

Magic number. This is a short string that must contains the magic string "GH-3". It may be used to validate the file (this feature is not implemented yet).
